name: Project Bounty
description:
Infiltrate the city. Find your target. Eliminate him.

You are the Bounty Hunter, tasked with eliminating a deadly clan leader in the heart of The City. Between you and him, however, are many enemies that want you dead. Can you overcome the odds to claim your bounty?

Features
  • Take advantage of an expansive set of attacks to take down your opposition, with moves such as light attacks, heavy attacks, special attacks, and more!
  • Explore The City and uncover its various secrets and shortcuts!
  • Fight deadly enemies and learn their tricky attack patterns!
  • Multiple difficulty levels give you the option to tackle the game however you want!
  • Record your mission score on the Leaderboards (local only, online leaderboards coming soon) and challenge your friends!

Note: This game is in early development and many bugs may still exist.

For a full list of the assets used in the production of Project Bounty (art, animations, music etc.), click the Google Drive link below:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1p46_25amPILiOYtP7Wni6nLYPo4K7ovPj0hezEgbBv8/...
